description: Demolition of existing garages to rear and construction of outbuilding at rear.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of the decision notice. Reason: To comply with the provisions of S.51 of the Planning & Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.
The external finishing materials shall match those used in the construction of the existing building and/or areas of hard surfacing. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans and documents, as set out below:A100, A101, A102, A103, A104.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The development hereby approved shall only be used for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the site dwelling and shall at no time be occupied independently as a self-contained unit.Reason: To ensure that the outbuilding does not adversely affect the amenity of adjoining residential premises and is not used for unauthorised purposes.
